Package com.aldodaquino.cobra.main

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aldodaquino.cobra.main.Utils
  • class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Some utilities for the blockchain. Contains method to get gas information and to convert bytes32 to Strings and vice-versa.
    Version:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Aldo D'Aquino.
